website_summaries.verdict: This warm and cozy hoodie is made of soft fleece inside and is of high quality, making it an impressive purchase.
pros: Available in many different color options to suit every sense of style
This is a simple hoodie with subtle details, such as stitching in the middle of the hood to keep the drawstring neatly in place
cons: Certain colors will shed lint onto undershirt at times

customer_reviews.title: My life was changed forever
customer_reviews.text: After placing this piece of champion apparel, my life forever changed as I felt I ascended into a further plane of understanding and comprehension, my body fell to the earth as my mind soar across the cosmos, further understanding our concept of reality. As I soared across the universe, gazed upon our universe existence, and shaked hands with the omniscience itself, I feel complete. It’s pretty soft.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, clean hoodie.
customer_reviews.text: Great hoodie for a great price I’m 5’ 11” and about 165 pounds I ordered a size large for a little bit of a looser fit and it was just as I expecting super comfy and warm, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: annie lake

customer_reviews.title: Love this hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: Great hoodie, the quality is there. I'm 5'5 115 lbs and I got a size small. Definitely reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm cotton and fleece hoodie
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this sweater! Comfortable and cute! Fleece like material inside, so keeps you pretty warm. I purchased a large (F / 5'4" / 155 lbs) b/c I like to wear tshirts underneath and a baggy fit. Is baggy but perfect and exactly what I wanted. I live in mine; purchased 2!
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectation.
customer_reviews.text: 5'5 165 lbs. I normally wear a M but wanted a roomier fit. The large was perfect. Tiny details made the hoodie great such as metal ends for the drawstring and stitching on the middle of the hood to prevent the drawstring from being pulled out. I do recommend removing the itchy tag. It comes of easily with a knife. It is stitched separately so removing it does not compromised the actual hoodie. Will buy again, but I found better prices from local brick and mortar stores if you use a coupon.
customer_reviews.author: NDGARTY

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: These hoodies are fantastic. We've purchased three now. My 13-year-old son loves them, this is why we have three. We found something he really likes and it doesn't break the bank. He said they're really comfortable. He's close to 5'7" and130 pounds and wearing a small. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm 1m80 and 174lbs and the size M fits me just perfect!!! I have just enough room as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for the oversized look and I like it. It's also got a really soft fleece ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a girl and I usually wear a size 4-6 in women's. I ordered the small for this sweatshirt. I was surprised at how large it actually was. It hits the tops of my thighs and the sleeves are a little long. However, I was looking for the oversized look and I like it. It's also got a really soft fleece interior and came with a tag of authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap foreign import
customer_reviews.text: Champion should be embarrassed to put there logo on this sweatshirt. I have been wearing champion hoodies for about 15 years with success. Not this cheap foreign import. When held up to light you can see thru thin fabric. Runs very small. 3xl is more like 1xl. Sleeves are even smaller and shorter compared to body. Cuffs and waist band have absolutely no stretch or snugness. Worth about $5 at local thrift store. Not the $25 I paid. Would give it 0 stars if possible. Yes this is definitely going back for full refund
customer_reviews.author: CCH3

customer_reviews.title: not only is it small, it continues to shrink ...
customer_reviews.text: not only is it small, it continues to shrink with every washing until the neck has to be ripped out in order to get it over your head. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S. Kinoff

customer_reviews.text: I live in these things 7 moths out of the year - but being 6'5" and 220 lbs I wish the arms were longer - XXL's always seem to be more for the heavy guy rather than the longer guys .. Champion should look into an XLT and XXLT size and make a killing - I'd pay an extra $20 for the same hoodies. Doesn't make sense that a 5'5" 220lb guy wears the same size hoodie as the 6'5" 220lb guy.. one guy is swimming in the bodie and has slightly short sleaves - and the other fills the body and has to roll the sleeves up 3-4 times ..
customer_reviews.author: Prime Rewards Card Member

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect! Not tight- comfortable loose fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size medium for a 5'7" 160 lb male. Fit perfect! Not tight- comfortable loose fit! He is normally a size medium for t-shirts and so I was gonna size up for the sweatshirt but after reading the other reviews it seemed like a medium was appropriate. Glad it worked out ! We haven't washed it yet so I'm not sure how it will go about with shrinkage - plan on hanging it to dry for now... might shrink a bit and still be okay size wise but not yet willing to risk it ! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a female, 5’7 and 145lbs. I ordered a hoodie in medium. I like my hoodies with a little room and this size was perfect for me. Yes, it’s a little baggy, but it fits great for my liking. The hoodie didn’t show much signs of shrinking for me when I washed it either! Although when I got my hoodie, there was a black smudge on the hood. I’m not much concerned about it, but it stands out where the hoodie is white. Overall I love this!! It keeps you nice and warm. Good for weather in the 60’s for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations and you get more than what you payed for.
customer_reviews.text: What can i say, it fits perfectly and i was surprised by the quality especially for the relatively low price, I normally wear a size XL but i wanted a roomier feel so i went with XXL and i was not disappointed, When i first saw the reviews and the price i thought it was overhyped but i was wrong, this hoodie is definitely worth it! Im planning on buying more with different colors very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Shady313

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Girlfriends WILL Steal This
customer_reviews.text: I stole this sweater from my boyfriend for a good 5 months (not proud of that). When he "borrowed" it and I didn't see it coming back to me anytime soon, I decided to just grab myself one! His was grey so I ordered the sea bottom blue in a size down. Great color, soft, and very comfy! Especially for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: XL is too big and Large too small
customer_reviews.text: 5' 9" 180 - Was swimming in the XL, got a Large instead. The large felt small but "fit". Well, it did till it went through the wash one time. No dryer, hung it up. Ill stay away from champion tops moving forward. I've also experienced this with their t shirts too.. the jump between Large and XL is too much. Either its a short slim fit or a dress. If i had to pick a size again for the hoodie, i would go XL. Rather have an over sized comfy hoodie than a slim fit uncomfortable one that rides up when you sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Leaves lint all over your clothes
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I found this as I love Champion products, but when I received this I immediately noticed this products inferior quality! There were lots of loose threads and the hoodie left lint all over my t-shirt underneath! I tried washing and drying it to see if the lint situation would improve, unfortunately there was very little improvement and the hoodie still left lint all over my clothes. I sadly had to return this. Don't buy it unless you want a very poor quality hoodie. It's a shame Champion even puts their name on this
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lowden

customer_reviews.title: Champion
customer_reviews.text: Hahaha. WHen I was a kid the Champion brand was at the local Kmart. Kids wouldn't be caught dead in them. But now, kids think that my kid has money now that he wears Champion Brand. Hahaha. Soon Arizona, Martha Stewart, Shirts with pictures of Cars on them and ICEE's will come back and only the "popular" kids will have them. Jeez
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend... He's 6'2" 180 lbs, and the XL fit him perfectly. What we love about this hoodie is that the end of the drawstrings are actually protected by metal rather than tied off, or having those plastic ends. Our kitten loves to chew our drawstrings when we wear hoodies, but he can't destroy these drawstrings because of the metal! haha. Stupid, I know, but just thought I'd mention the metal ends.
customer_reviews.author: Vanya

customer_reviews.title: The ladies love me...
customer_reviews.text: After owning this item for a couple of days, I noticed that everywhere I go the ladies notice this Champion Hoodie. I had one lady ask me for an autograph, I kindly declined and asked her to read the bible with me. Long story short, we read the bible, went to my apartment, got comfortable in bed....and she proceeded to reach over me and grabbed my phone! Then demanded I get her one of these hoodies! As I am a holy man, I bought her one and sent her away. Great night indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. Leaves cotton balls everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Update* definitely different from the same sweater i bought 2 years ago. Quality not good. The inside leaves cotton balls all on my shirt and laundry. Terrible. Also the fabric is softer less durable then the original. Wish this sweater was made like the original. Also buy a size smaller. Love these sweaters and for the price you just can't find any better. I like the new style but i also have to old style and quality is the same. Good!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge831

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable at this price
customer_reviews.text: low price and quality product. HOODIE STRINGS EVEN HAVE METAL AGLETS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great hoodie. I got it in grey and I was surprised on how much it would exceed my expectations. It's really soft inside and made with good quality fabrics. I'm on the taller side, 6'3", but im slim as well and I got the MED. and the sweater is long which I love. I would buy it again especially for a gift. Its a great every day sweatshirt hoodie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic basic inexpensive hoodie.
customer_reviews.text: Champion was always the go-to brand for quality athletic gear in the 80s. The quality isn't quite what it used to be, but it's still about the best you'll find at this priice point. 5'9", 170 lbs, athletic build, and a Large size fits perfectly. Comfortably loose without being baggy. The hood is lined with a soft black material. The overall hoodie fabric is just your basic cheap cotton/poly blend. The neck and near the cuffs will pill up in just a couple weeks. This isn't going to stay sleek like more modern polyester fleeces such as Under Armor. But if you just want a basic sturdy hoodie for kicking around, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sherpa Benet

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As a woman, I’m always comparing the prices of men’s clothing to women’s clothing, especially when it’s a sweater by the same company. The markup for women’s clothing is ridiculous so I decided to buy a men’s sweater. I purchased the size L because I wanted a looser fit as I like to workout in that kind of clothing. I’d expect most women to purchase the M size as it’s not as baggy as the L but I loved the way the L looked! I genuinely have no complaints and I will definitely be buying this sweater again!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Items shipped much faster than expected. Good quality hoodies. They seem like they will hold up well over time. Ribbed wrists and waist band, and metal aglets on drawstring. I normally wear an XL in most brands. With this I could almost be okay in a large, there is plenty of room to move around. At first I considered returning them but I have decided to keep them. I'm happy with my purchase and would consider purchasing more in different colors, especially while they are on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Totally faded
customer_reviews.text: 4 months later, completely faded. (Navy) It’s thick and warm, looked great out of the package. Only need washed with care and not too many times either. My kid doesn’t care, but it looks horrible on him now.
customer_reviews.author: iceska8r

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit's exact. Only thing to note is that when putting it on, a lot of lint from the hoodie gets trapped in your hair etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shinel SpaldingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best hoodies made
customer_reviews.text: Champion makes the best hoodies hands down...they’re cozy, oversize and warm with or without a shirt underneath. The only down side is it sheds on what ever shirt I’m wearing underneath and once i washed it there was lint everywhere I definitely recommend washing by itself . I bought the grey and light blue ...I’m 5’2 162 and got size small and its still big ....
customer_reviews.author: Brenicole

customer_reviews.title: Great, Comfy Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: I normally would wear a L, but in these mens champion hoodies I size down to M and it's still roomy. I'm female, 5'7. I think if you're a girl, you can definitely size down in these and it should be good unless you really want it oversized then probably keeping your regular size or 1 up should be fine. Price was good.
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality will buy another down the road
customer_reviews.text: I am not biased I have written negative and positive comments for everything on here and I’m a real consumer not a bought and paid bot. this hoodie is solid, well-made and it fits proper I’m 6’2” 200 I bought (XL size) it in black And it’s kept its color after a half a dozen washes on the regular cycle wash. I will probably purchase another down the road hope this helps as I take these reviews into most of my Consideration when looking for a product on here take care
customer_reviews.author: matt sarzynski

customer_reviews.title: Nice subdued logo option
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter wanted an orange, "plain" hooded sweatshirt. Not an easy find I will tell you. Most athletic sweatshirts have their logo big as can be, front and center so I was thrilled to find this with the subdued Champion logo. She loves it and has worn it almost everyday since she got it. For middle schoolers this constitutes a winter coat, so we are glad to find something she likes that is warm and comfy. Well done Champion.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The quality is Good! Just one thing, careful with the SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this product is not a fake Champion even tho the price might come to a surprise to you. (Thats why it's so famous) The quality Champion brings in is already known to many people so you would expect that this hoodie does not ware off easily. Also, it has a lot of color variation where you can choose different color for your own fashion choice. Everything about this product was satisfactory just that I chose the wrong size and didn't have the time to return it or get a refund. So just get the right size for your own sake and enjoy the GOOD product with very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Settle for Less
customer_reviews.text: I had an old Champion hoodie in maroon/burgundy red, and wanted to get another. I made the mistake of being cheap and buying the amazon essentials brand, which was a low quality and had a bizarre fit. The arms were floppy, the torso was a size too small. BY COMPARISON... The Champion brand hoodie fits beautifully. It is soft, high quality fabric, sturdy stitching, and fits exactly like every other men’s large hoodie fits. I’m short and thick, but large hoodies have always fit me without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfy. I'm 5' 11" and got a medium, so that it would be a bit tight, so that I could layer other things over it. It fits just about perfectly. The material is soft and it keeps me warm at around freezing temps with a light jacket over it, while hopping in and out of the car making deliveries. I would get a large if using for a top layer.
customer_reviews.author: John Dear

customer_reviews.title: This can't be right.
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculously small. I'm a women's large and ordered this men's large, assuming it would be a little roomy. I couldn't even fit my head through the opening and there was zero "give" to the fabric whatsoever. It felt thick and soft, which was nice; decent quality, just the sizing is terribly off. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Men’s small is more a women’s small. It was even snug on my 5’2 120 lb daughter. I’m Trying to exchange:return without shipping cost but seller has yet to respond to my email. If your man is small (I was buying for my 13 year old son) I suggest getting this in size large for the green sweatshirt I don’t know if the other colors vary in size otherwise very nice sweatshirt material and color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choose your color wisely.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these in different colors. Black, navy Heather, and the maroon. Overall they are great - except that the maroon shrunk the first time I washed it. In the same load as the other two and they are fine. I only dry about half way on low in the dryer then hang dry to finish. I can still wear it but it's not as comfortable as my others, so I probably won't wear it much. Not sure what's up with the maroon one, but I would certainly recommend other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I find that Champion is that happy medium when you don't want to splurge for Under Armour but don't want Hanes or Gildan. These are good hoodies for the price. Mine are holding up nicely in the wash and I usually do the cold water and hang dry or tumble dry low. The Hotline Blue is my favourite out of the 2 I purchased. The color really pops and it has an athletic fit. Go a size up if you want baggy, these fit true to size. I ordered a medium and on my 5'10 frame they look good on me.
customer_reviews.author: GILDO

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, quality material, and great price
customer_reviews.text: Champion seems to always make great sweats and sweatshirts. It fits true to size and looks great. It’s nice and thick and good quality cotton. I purchased 3 of these for my son because he needed more sweatshirts that fit. He likes the loose fit and he has long arms like a swimmer so he always gets XL. My husband fits these too. He’s 5’10” and 180lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great basic hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie fits perfectly, and is a huge step up from a lot of the sweatshirts I own already. I have an issue with GIldan hoodies being too tight around the bottom which makes them end up being too short and creating an unflattering silhouette. I really like the fit of this sweatshirt and find it to be a really comfortable material that I imagine will stand the test of time. The metal tips on the drawstrings are a nice touch as well!
customer_reviews.author: evan wachowski

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small, but overall a GREAT hoodie.
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this for my son for Christmas, but he's made it clear he prefers zip hoodies, so I kind of inherited it back from him. Anyhow, just wore it for the first time. Aside from being a bit on the small side for me (I'm 6'2", 230 lbs, my son is a bit shorter, so it probably would have fit him better), it's possibly the most comfortable hoodie I own.
customer_reviews.author: Previous Subscriber

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cheese
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a decent, good looking hoodie. I am 5’10”, 170 lbs and I bought a Medium and it fits like a sweatshirt should. Not too large/baggy and not form fitting. It’s not a heavy sweatshirt that’s real thick. I have a red long sleeve shirt under it and you can tell. So the material is not see through per se but it’s not a very dense material. For lounging or wearing under a jacket, this hoodie seems like a quality deal.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaHenry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, material and weight
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, material and weight. I like all the color choices, the monochrome embroidered Champion patch that matches the sweatshirt's color. The hood drawstrings are long and have nice silver aglet tips. Two gripes: - wish the shoulder seams were diagonal rather than on shoulder - the inside of the hood has contrast color to the main color, it looks odd and a little dorky to me
customer_reviews.author: Anthony U.

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small. I am a women, 5’6” 135lbs. Typically a men’s small fits big on me. When I received this hoodie I was very disappointed. The neck hole and the waist band had absolutely no give. I could barely get my head through the hole and The waste fit really snug causing the extra material to sit weird in the abdominal area. Needless to say, I returned the item. The return and refund process was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie is trash. Quality is very bad. Sewing is coming off. It keeps tearing up. The hood on the hoodie is very big and does not look good when you have it on. The hoodie feels very weird while wearing. Not comfortable at all. Would not recommend. I generally love products from champion but this one is a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad S.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased five of these hoodies for my teenage Grandsons. They absolutely loved them. Finally something they really like, once they opened their presents they immediately put them on. I could hear them saying “Oh Wow I really love this”. The quality is very good, so soft and thick. Of course they’re Champion. I purchased a good product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Lady

customer_reviews.title: I really love this hoodie.
customer_reviews.text: It's not a standard Champion kinda a low key option but I really love the look of this hoodie on my son. This makes the 6th Champion hoodie I have bought between my two teenage sons. Champion is a really popular brand now, it didn't use to be. They love their Champion hoodies. This one is a great fit, great quality. Holding up to washing really well as we have had it about a month and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: jantzen

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product, fits as expected. I wear "hoodie" style sweaters a lot as I live in a place that is breezy and chilly much of the time and I like the hood. I prefer that to wearing a cap or hat.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelC

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper feeling material. Feels thin
customer_reviews.text: The fit of this shirt after washing is much smaller than other brands I have ordered in same size. I know now not to order this brand cause my short, stocky son was too large for the xl shirt. The other brands I ordered a larger size and they came much larger and they didn’t shrink like this one. I’m gonna stay away from this brand. Son is 5’ 10”, 235 lbs. extra large would have been ok but not if you wear anything underneath. Then it’s really to snug!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A.

customer_reviews.title: The best price!
customer_reviews.text: You may need to wash it when you first get it, it might seem to big at first but after that first wash on cold or warm water you'll love it even more. Very comfortable and keeps me feeling warmer with this added piece. I order the Navy blue one and will soon order the gray, black, and red one. I love these champion hoodies they're so dope and others will love them as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: The Kid Loved It!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value over the mall stores. As far as I could tell the quality was the same. Its a thick fleece hoodie not a think cheap imitation. The logos were factory correct and not sewn crooked. Save yourselves a little cash and buy this one. My 12yr old said it was the same as other kids at school so it should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: T.Stark

customer_reviews.title: great quality sweatshirt for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Champion is a brand I kind of forgot about but I saw these hoodies for under 20 dollars and couldn't pass them up. i got them in a few days. I am very impressed with how well they are made. They are great for layering and wearing during the winter months. sizing was perfect however they are a tiny bit smaller than my other large size hoodies. One tip to make them last a real long time is to wash them on cold and hang dry them. Ill be buying more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It's fit perfectly and It's real Champion
customer_reviews.text: When ordering I was a bit skeptical about whether or not it was authentic (because of how cheap it was) but let me say if it is fake, it's the most convincing fake I've ever seen in my life. I compared the tags and logos to the ones on a pair of sweats I got from Macy's and I couldn't tell the difference at all (maybe because there isn't any). It's also super soft and comfy which is why I prefer to buy men's hoodies in the first place 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Aneola

customer_reviews.title: The gray hoodie fits great and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The grey hoodie fits great and is super comfortable. Thanks. The navy hoodie did not fit even close to the same as the gray. It is smaller across the chest and the opening for the neck is very tiny and barely fit. The sizes are marked the same as XXL, but they definitely do not fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Greene

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully-made for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this is and not too heavy but also not lightweight. Really nicely made hoodie and I have some other hoodies and this is by far the best in quality considering the price. Only downside for me is that the sleeves are too long. I'm 5'1, 105lbs, and got the small. Will still wear for sure.
customer_reviews.author: AU

customer_reviews.title: Not normal sizing
customer_reviews.text: Got this cause it's my son's high school colors. I ordered my normal size that normally fits a little roomy on me. The bottom elastic piece was so tight I can't even get the thing on. Very disappointed in this. I paid alot more than my normal brands and can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Love the color of this champion shirt
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shirt. Color is nice. Disappointed that I attempted to order this shirt the night prior when the prices was $6 and the seller rejected the sale. I purchased it the next day for $20. Worth the price; however, disappointed at false price advertised to draw in customers.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Great Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Got the blue one for my 13year old. He looks great in it and says it feels good. Plus is that it is warm without being too bulky. He hasn't worn it much yet to speak to durability, but he was very pleased with the fit and feel. It's a nice heather blue color too.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Brown

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny, very very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing about this hoodie that i dislike. it fits perfectly, is very soft, and hugs the waist instead of hovering around it. sleeves are nice and long enough. the fit is just perfect. i might purchase another one in a large and in a different color. i love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime B

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie
customer_reviews.text: These hoodies are really well made and high quality. I've bought 1 large and 2 mediums - one grey, one black. They fit me great and are warm - not made of cheap, thin materials. Will very likely buy more in different colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda tight.
customer_reviews.text: I guess there’s a different version of this that fits better. I ordered this one and a different seller with the same type of hoodie. This one doesn’t really give like the other one. Hopefully I’m not giving a bad review on a product that is supposed to be that way but it’s a heads up for you guys that know what I’m talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Feels like they used little cheaper material than other Champion clothes. Dramatically shrunk after one wash and dry. I bought bigger size in the beginning and now it fits perfect on me. Did not plan on that but worked out well. Recommend buying one size up
customer_reviews.author: Haejoo

customer_reviews.title: All three colors ran small
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hoodies, most are mens size M. I ordered the black, oxford gray, and maroon in size M and all were a bit too snug. I was worried they might shrink more once washed so I returned them. The quality seemed good, but they were sized smaller than other M's I have, the black one was particularly bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi H

customer_reviews.title: Just loves it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a small for my 14 year old daughter (5' 3") and it fits a tad loose, just the way they like it! She plays sports, so has over 20 sweatshirts, but this is her favorite by far! This blue is also the perfect shade. Washed it a couple of times so far and size/color remains the same.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: These Hoodies Give Me a Reason to Live
customer_reviews.text: These hoodies are amazing; and for the price, you’ll never beat it. I own like 20 of them, no joke. So comfortable and can be worn for most occasions. I would sell my firstborn child to have an infinite amount of these hoodies for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: I had an XL of the same brand same type gifted to me. I bought another XL and it feels like a L. Noticeably different in sizes but they both say XL. Same exact material. It’s like they put the wrong tag on. If it was more consistent it would rate higher.
customer_reviews.author: Julie333Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Plan to get one for myself (adult female). I got as a gift for teen boy and it looks super comfortable and worth the money. He wears his all the time and I'm sure I'll wear mine on weekends. About to order one and figured I'd write a review while here.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this hoodie. I’m a girl 5’6 145 lbs and I bought a medium, it’s cozy and just slightly oversize. The sizing is a little awkward the medium is a little bigger than I want and I feel like the small would be too small. Other than that, this is a great hoodie for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiti

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: This sweatshirt is a wonderful color, quality, and fit. It has washed well. We bought it for my sons birthday. He is wearing the large. I feel this price was great. It is a little less fancy than other champion sweatshirts, but still great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I

customer_reviews.title: Great Material, Good Fit, Overall Good Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my hoodie in Navy Blue. I'm 6ft, 135 pounds, and I ordered a medium, and it fits quite well. This hoodie is aesthetically pleasing. I expected it to bunch up on the waist, but it didn't! It wraps around the wrists and waist quite nicely. There are metal coated aglets, which give off a very nice look. On the head, the hood feels nice and looks nice. There are no pointy ends on the hood, giving it a great look. The two strands attached to the hoodie are quite long and tend to collide. Overall, this hoodie is pretty great. I would definitely buy it over some of the other Champion hoodies.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson M.

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and XL because I like my hoodies oversized and it was perfect! I absolutely love this hoodie and the quality is great. I've worked outside in it and it still looks new. It is warm but not too thick. Good for layering under a jacket or coat. The color was accurate to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Z.

customer_reviews.title: Undersized
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've had to return a Champion product, fit and finish has always been good. Not only was the overall fit too small, I could barely get my head through the neck. I've worn Extra Large for yrs; really think 2x large would be too big (longer sleeves, too baggy, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: It’s a champion sweatshirt, Exactly what I expected. Nothing fancy but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It’s a champion sweatshirt, exactly what I expected the only thing I don’t like is that the C logo on the front of the shirt is the same color of the product. I think they should use white like they used to use back in the day early 90s style
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Got an XL and fits pretty well... Hard to find nice Hoodies for under $30! Not a light weight hoodie but not an extremely heavy Hoodie... Right in the middle... I’m 5’5 around 200lbs . Plan on loosing weight so over time even if it shrinks a little bit it should still fit just fine... I like my hoodies a little baggy anyway..
customer_reviews.author: Sterbs

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kind of hoodie is always champion. I've got the medium grey one almost a year ago and love the way it fits so I got a medium this time around.... well it's just a tiny bit smaller. And it really bugs me because the other one fits so perfectly. But other then that it's great! I would just recommend considering getting a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Womer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and keeps you warm on chilly days
customer_reviews.text: It's not too heavyweight yet it can keep me warm even on some cold nights out. I own this in both olive and maroon and haven't noticed any fades or too much piling. A lot of other hoodies for the same price can deteriorate after 2-3 months of wear, but I've had this for over a year and now it still has a lot of life. I got during a sale for $20 each but $40 is still very reasonable. You definitely want to buy 2-3 next time they're on sale.
customer_reviews.author: teeesquare

customer_reviews.title: Great hoody but too short
customer_reviews.text: Choosing “fit as expected” because width wise it was just right but the length was short. It was a gift for my son that I had a custom design put on. He’s tall and solid, but thin. Going up sizes makes it too wide. Prob would not recommend for people 6’ or taller.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Soft hoodie, but when it says 2x it really means TWO-X. It’s what I would consider a larger styled fit to each size, if that makes sense. I stole most of his hoodies (of course) and I wanted to start giving him new ones. He normally wears 1x-2x so I figured a LITTLE baggy would be okay. Well, I hope this shrinks a little because it’s more than a lil baggy but not quite a dress on him. Either way he looks amazing in the darker red shade and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Grace

customer_reviews.title: 5'9" 135lbs- size Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, 5'9" 135lbs. It fits a little large, but not much. In my opinion sweaters and pullovers should be larger so I think it's perfect. My son has long arms and the sleeves go to his hands. Maybe a little more if we were to measure the limits. The interior of it is very plush and warm. When I got it and pulled it out it seemed a bit thin so I was worried but it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Cupp

customer_reviews.title: Cautious of knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure that either the quality dropped because of the push for quantity available during the Christmas rush, or this is a knock off. The “C” on the sleeve is almost hand stitched on, and only at a few points. Stands out and looks fake.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The sleeves on both sides are still different, one loose and one tight.
customer_reviews.text: This sweater is not good workmanship. The sleeves on both sides are still different, one loose and one tight. Inappropriate to wear.
customer_reviews.author: XIYI  LI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit - soft
customer_reviews.text: I'm 145 lbs - 5'8" I got a medium. The sleeves are long enough to cover my hands (never happens for me) The bottom is slim enough to touch my hips, so I don't look like I'm swimming in it, but loose enough for the big comfy - favorite - hoodie status. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Most definitely a real champion hoodie! Came with the authentic tags and everything. I was a little skeptical because I wanted a white one and the one that was labeled white had a picture of a grey hoodie. But it came white! I am going to tie dye it :)
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: True to size, Nice Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is true to size and since it was a gift, that worked out perfect. Nice quality and despite looking grey online, it IS in fact, WHITE. A nice bright brand new white, so I’m actually going to order a couple for myself......
customer_reviews.author: Soozett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but thin
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my vain 12 year old son! Meets the requirements for dress code at school and still practical enough to wear hiking or balling. Good quality. Steep price. A little on the thin side but hes happy so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Girls, crop this and save money!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6” 125 lbs and bought a men’s size L so I could cut and crop it. This one cost only $22.50 and the girls cropped sweatshirt in black cost $49.50 :O, so this was more fun and economical. I cut directly above the front pocket line to keep as much length as possible, just like any cropped top, it does show your stomach when arms lift, but the size L hits my belly button so it’s perfect for high waist pants. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: torrie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a hoodie in his school color. Found this one, great price, right color etc. He opened the package and was so pleased. He has worn it every day since he got it. It fits as expected. I am now looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I had a Jerzee hoodie that I loved but with time it became worn and thin so now I rely on it for doing my chores. Wanted a slightly heavier replacement hoodie and found it in the Champion version. Super happy with the fit and quality of material and manufacture. Will definitely buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Textures is important
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Only thing I dislike is its texture. Inside feels great during cool season, but outside is a little rough. Looks good when you wear it alone, but looks weird when you wear it inside a jacket or any outerwear.
customer_reviews.author: DarkistVoid

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my purchase. It arrived a day earlier than it was expected to arrive! Package came Undamaged, and upon opening, the sweater was 100% intact; Did not indicate that the sweater was used, plus it didn't have any chemical odors. No rips, loose stitching or loose threads. Not sure why other's reviews have pictures of damaged sweaters, I have purchased lots of clothing from Amazon without any complications. Very happy with my sweater, very high quality. I will definitely purchase more and recommend to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jannica Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good athletic fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fella, he says its warm and when he tried it on I thought it fit pretty well! He typically wears XL in sweatshirts (athlete build) but based on some reviews I bought an L. This seemed to still be broad enough in the shoulders and chest area and long enough in the arms.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Back then, I used to buy XL hoodies or Large (because of my past weight) now I’m 193, 5’11 height and this hoodie is Medium and is just perfect and I love it so much. For people who are Large on shirts, my advice is to buy it Medium because of the reviews I seen. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Luis Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hoodie
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites go thru my purchase reviews and you will see I've ordered alot of champion they are well made and hold up and have the best comfort to offer for the price. I've never had a bad hoodie with champion.
customer_reviews.author: JBLANTONIII

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre Quality
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect too much. The fabric is thin, not what I would expect in a pullover hoodie. I guess you get your money's worth, but barely. I wouldn't buy it again. I would rather pay a few more dollars and hope for better quality. My concern is that after a few washings it's going to be even more thin. Hardly a champion of hoodies.
customer_reviews.author: Maominglu

customer_reviews.title: It shrinks
customer_reviews.text: It will shrink! I got a men’s large and When I got it, it was huge (how I liked it). I washed it knowing it would shrink some and it shrunk a good few inches vertically. The width is still the same. I’m happy with it. (This is also the cheaper of the Champion hoodies)
customer_reviews.author: Monica A.

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for $25, and for the price, you can’t beat this comfy and fashionable hoodie. I’m 5’3 125lbs and the small size was great for an oversized fit. It’s baggy in the shoulders if you’re a woman, and you aren’t going to get that shaped fit you’d get from a woman’s cut. However, the material seems to be of good quality and it beats spending the $60 Champion sells their hoodies for on their website.
customer_reviews.author: SBeau

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 14 yo son: he is about 5’8, 110lbs and the medium fit him perfectly. My son loves it, says it is warm and just the right thickness. He’s worn it every day since getting it. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: epq

customer_reviews.title: Hood is WAY too short.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality. IDK why they made the neck hole so small and the hood so comically short. Classic case of a company trying to fix what isn't broken. Quality wise I love these. I run through two of them a year working. Go to work hoodie for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo HAPPY that I found these hoodies on Amazon since I use to buy them from Target and for some reason they STOPPED SELLING THEM! So far they seem exactly the same although I've not worn it more than a few minutes. Will update if anything changes. 🥰
customer_reviews.author: WitchyWoman

product_meta.title: Champion Men's Powerblend Fleece Pullover Hoodie
product_meta.description: Say hello to you new favorite fleece hoodie. With reduced pilling and shrinkage, this style will keep its great look wash after wash. With super soft fabric and a modern silhouette, you'll never leave home without it.
feature_bullets: Body: 50% Cotton/50% polyester; rib: 49% cotton/49% polyester/2% spandex; half moon: solid: 100% cotton; granite: 50% cotton/50% polyester; oxford: 90% cotton/10% black polyester
Cotton/polyester blend helps reduce pilling and shrinkage, Brushed inside for exceptional softness against skin.
Wider ribbed cuffs and waistband stay flat and keep the chill out, Hand-warming front pouch pocket
Longer length for a better fit and coverage, Triple stitching reinforces seams for durability.
A percentage of recycled fibers are used in making the fabric, Embroidered C logo on chest and cuff.
Two-ply hood with drawcord keeps you covered, Half moon neck facing for no irritation.
